SELECT schedule_no, account, schedule_title, schedule_view_count, schedule_content, schedule_count, schedule_at, total_point, participation_points FROM schedules WHERE club_no = #{clubNo} AND schedule_is_deleted = false ORDER BY schedule_created_at DESC
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE schedule_no = LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedules (schedule_title, schedule_content, account, club_no, schedule_at, participation_points) VALUES (#{scheduleTitle}, #{scheduleContent}, #{account}, #{clubNo}, #{scheduleAt}, #{participationPoints})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM users INNER JOIN users_clubs ON users.account = users_clubs.account WHERE users_clubs.user_club_join_no IN (SELECT user_club_join_no FROM users_schedules WHERE schedule_no = #{scheduleNO} AND user_schedule_role = 'WAITING')
SELECT * FROM users_schedules WHERE user_club_join_no IN (SELECT user_club_join_no FROM users_clubs WHERE account = #{account})
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET remained_point = remained_point - (SELECT participation_points FROM schedules WHERE schedule_no = #{scheduleNo} ) WHERE account = #{account}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO points_histories (point_history_amount, point_history_type, account, schedule_no) VALUES (#{point}, #{type}, #{account}, #{scheduleNo})
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET remained_point = remained_point + (SELECT participation_points FROM schedules WHERE schedule_no = #{scheduleNo} ) WHERE account = #{account}
